TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit GeneralTransform2DTo3D extends System.Windows.Freezable

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Visual.TransformToAncestor%2A> method returns a GeneralTransform2DTo3D object.
GeneralTransform2DTo3D is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks Transform is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

MemberSignature.Value: public bool TryTransform (System.Windows.Point inPoint, out System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D result);
.method public hidebysig instance bool TryTransform(valuetype System.Windows.Point inPoint, valuetype System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D result) cil managed

Docs.summary: Attempts to transform the specified point and returns a value that indicates whether the transformation was successful.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Unlike the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform2DTo3D.Transform%2A> method, this method does not throw an exception if the transformation is unsuccessful.
TryTransform is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
